quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: No matter how dark the night, morning always comes, and our journey begins anew.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The code you write today is the legacy you leave for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Coding is the closest thing we have to a superpower.
quotes.author: Drew Houston

quotes.quote: Programmers are not just problem solvers, they are solution architects.
quotes.author: John Johnson

quotes.quote: Coders: turning caffeine into code, emotions into algorithms.
quotes.author: Al Capone

quotes.quote: Emotions in bits, logic in bytes - that's the world of a coder.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Coding is the art of turning ideas into instructions for machines to follow.
quotes.author: Chris Pine

quotes.quote: Coding is not just about typing lines; it's about crafting digital experiences.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The best code is like poetry; it is concise, elegant, and powerful.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Coding is a journey of self-discovery, where every bug fixed is a lesson learned.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: Coding is the language of the future, and those who speak it will shape tomorrow.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul; that makes us reach for more, that plants the fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Love is not about how much you say 'I love you,' but how much you can prove that it's true.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I have found the one whom my soul loves.
quotes.author: Song of Solomon

quotes.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Love doesn't make the world go 'round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: In your light, I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems. You dance inside my chest where no one sees you, but sometimes I do, and that sight becomes this art.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Friendship is the golden thread that ties the heart of all the world.
quotes.author: John Evelyn

quotes.quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Friendship is the shadow of the evening, which increases with the setting sun of life.
quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

quotes.quote: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
quotes.author: Len Wein

quotes.quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: I'm not clumsy, it's just the floor hates me, the tables and chairs are bullies, and the walls get in my way.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm on a whiskey diet. I've lost three days already.
quotes.author: Tommy Cooper

quotes.quote: I'm not lazy, I'm on energy-saving mode.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I told my computer I needed a break, now it won't stop sending me vacation ads.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not a complete idiot, some parts are missing.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I don't need anger management. I need people to stop making me angry.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not short, I'm just more down to earth than most people.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not old, I'm a classic.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Patience is a pillar of faith. To be patient means to endure silently and without complaint the tests of life.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

quotes.quote: Kindness is a mark of faith, and whoever is not kind has no faith.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

quotes.quote: The best among you are those who have the best manners and character.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

quotes.quote: Do not let your difficulties fill you with anxiety, after all, it is only in the darkest nights that stars shine more brightly.
quotes.author: Imam Ali ibn Abi Talib

quotes.quote: The strongest among you is the one who controls his anger.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

quotes.quote: Do good, even if others do not reciprocate. For the reward of goodness lies not in the response of others, but in the satisfaction of Allah.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

quotes.quote: Speak good or remain silent.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

quotes.quote: The best of people are those who are most beneficial to people.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

quotes.quote: When you see a person who has been given more than you in money and beauty, look to those who have been given less.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

quotes.quote: Mohabbat mein judai ka dard, dil ko chhoo kar rula deta hai.
quotes.author: Mirza Ghalib

quotes.quote: Dil ko behlane ke liye khayal achha hai, par uske baad khud ko sambhalna mushkil.
quotes.author: Faiz Ahmed Faiz

quotes.quote: Dil ki baat chhupana, tootne ki nishani hai.
quotes.author: Jaun Elia

quotes.quote: Tere bina duniya kya, jannat bhi adhuri hai..Tere bina jeena kya, marna bhi mushkil hai
quotes.author: Habiba

quotes.quote: Dhoondta hu tujhe har subah, har sham mein..Per dil mein hai ye darr, kahin tu na ho matlabi insaan ke naam mein
quotes.author: Habiba

quotes.quote: Kisi ke dil mein basna, toh bas dil ko todne ke liye hota hai.
quotes.author: Mohsin Naqvi

quotes.quote: Zindagi ke safar mein, naseeb ka silsila hai..Allah ki rehmat se sabar ka silsila hai
quotes.author: Wasi Shah

quotes.quote: Dil ka dard kisi ko batana nahi aata, isliye log mohabbat ka izhar karte hain.
quotes.author: Javed Akhtar

quotes.quote: Haters are just confused admirers because they can't figure out the reason why everyone loves you.
quotes.author: Jeffree Star

quotes.quote: I'd rather be hated for who I am than loved for who I am not.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: Don't let negative and toxic people rent space in your head. Raise the rent and kick them out.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: The closer one gets, the more venom they tend to send
quotes.author: Habiba

quotes.quote: Keep your circle small and your middle finger high.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: They wanna see you do good, but never better than them. Remember that.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember, the only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: It's not bragging if you can back it up.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: The closer you are, the deeper the ow!
quotes.author: Habiba

quotes.quote: Don't mistake my kindness for weakness. I am kind to everyone, but when someone is unkind to me, weak is not what you are going to remember about me.
quotes.author: Al Capone

quotes.quote: I'd rather die like a man than live like a coward.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: Love's game, i've chosen to resign. No longer fooled by its deceptive shine.
quotes.author: Habiba

quotes.quote: I'm not a businessman; I'm a business, man!
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.quote: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: By the way you shouldn't have drifted like this away, Had this pen now not been mute, night and day.
quotes.author: Habiba

quotes.quote: If you want to fly, you have to give up the things that weigh you down.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm on a whiskey diet. I've lost three days already.
quotes.author: Tommy Cooper

quotes.quote: I'm not short, I'm just more down to earth than most people.
quotes.author: Unknown
